task.title: Updating an Address
task.shortdesc: Update existing address information in your student records through the MyPack Portal.

taskbody.prereq: You must be logged into MyPack Portal with your NC State Unity account and have existing address information you wish to update.
taskbody.context: This task is performed to ensure that your address records are current, which is critical for receiving university communications and for emergency situations.

step.cmd: Log into your MyPack Portal using your NC State Unity account.
From the left-hand navigation menu, select "Addresses."
Click on the address box under the appropriate header, such as 'Home Address.'
Update the address fields as necessary.
Click the green 'Save' button to save your changes.

taskbody.result: After completing these steps, your address information will be updated in your student records.
